description: System-generated surrogate key uniquely identifying the country record.
Country code, likely ISO 3166-1 alpha-2; confirm with SME.
Free-text notes or remarks about the country; optional field.
System-maintained timestamp of the most recent update to this record.
Legacy timestamp of the most recent user-initiated update; overlaps with other audit fields; confirm with SME.
Identifier of the user or process that created the record.
Timestamp when the record was initially created.
Identifier of the user or process that last modified the record.
Timestamp of the most recent user-initiated modification to the record.
